channel.title: Can't attack in the wilderness?

item.title: Can't attack in the wilderness?
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:


The wildy Zone I am trying to add in is called “inMyZone”
What did I do wong?

if(inWild() && InFunPk() && !isInArd() && !isInFala() && !isInPvP() && !isInBank() && !inMyZone()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1); EarningPotential.checkPotential(this); getPA().walkableInterface(197); } else if (inMyZone()) { wildLevel = 55; getPA().walkableInterface(197); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);

}else if (!inCwWait && !inWild() && !isInPC() && !inBarrows() && !inDuelArena() && !inMyZone()) { getPA().sendFrame99(0); getPA().walkableInterface(-1); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null", 1); }

public boolean inWild() { if(isInFala() || isInArd() || InFunPk() || isInPvP() && !inMyZone()) { return true; } if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366){ return true; } return false; }

public boolean inMyZone() { if(absX > 2849 && absX < 2859 && absY > 3428 && absY < 3433) { return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
